word_mean: 癔病的，歇斯底里的：有癔病特征的

sentence.Network_en: Paul Mazursky was Master of Ceremonies, and he was pretty hysterical.
sentence.Network_cn: 保罗·马祖尔斯基担任司仪，他简直把人笑坏了。

sentence.Network_en: I suffered bouts of really hysterical depression.
sentence.Network_cn: 我曾患阵发的严重癔病性抑郁症。

sentence.Network_en: He made headlines and received hysterical hate mail.
sentence.Network_cn: 他成了新闻人物，收到了疯狂的攻击性邮件。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 受伤害的（hurt)歇斯底里的（hysterical)缺乏耐心的（impatient)
...用于排泄，所以用于性行为就是恶心的话，那么这和患有癔症（hysterical）的女孩因为阴茎用于排泄而厌恶（disgust）阴茎是一样 …
GCT英语备考:如何由"词"推"... ... 2. hemlock n. 一种有毒植物(毒芹) 4. hysterical a. 歇斯底里，异常兴奋 7. tur-moil n. 混乱.

hysterical chorea 癔病性舞蹈病hysterical personality 歇斯底里人格hysterical state 癔病状态

entry.tran: 歇斯底里的;情绪狂暴失控的
entry.def: Someone who is hysterical is in a state of uncontrolled excitement, anger, or panic.

example.ex: Police and bodyguards had to protect him as the almost hysterical crowds struggled to approach him...
example.tran: 当情绪几近失控的人群拼命想接近他时，警察和保镖不得不保护他。

example.ex: He made headlines and received hysterical hate mail.
example.tran: 他成了新闻人物，收到了疯狂的攻击性邮件。

entry.tran: 癔病的;（通常指因惊吓而）情绪异常激动的
entry.def: Someone who is hysterical is in a state of violent and disturbed emotion that is usually a result of shock.

example.ex: I suffered bouts of really hysterical depression.
example.tran: 我曾患阵发的严重癔病性抑郁症。

entry.tran: （笑声）疯狂失控的，不可抑制的
entry.def: Hysterical laughter is loud and uncontrolled.

example.ex: I had to rush to the loo to avoid an attack of hysterical giggles.
example.tran: 我不得不冲向卫生间，以免遭到别人的疯狂嘲笑。

entry.def: If you describe something or someone as hysterical, you think that they are very funny and they make you laugh a lot.

example.ex: Paul Mazursky was Master of Ceremonies, and he was pretty hysterical.
example.tran: 保罗·马祖尔斯基担任司仪，他简直把人笑坏了。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by or arising from psychoneurotic hysteria;

sentences.sentence: "during hysterical conditions various functions of the human body are disordered"- Morris Fishbein

means.word_mean: 2. marked by excessive or uncontrollable emotion;

auth_sentence.content: Queen of the Night's arrival are marvellously hysterical.
auth_sentence.res_content: Queen of the Night's arrival are marvellously hysterical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Queen of the Night's arrival are marvellously hysterical.

auth_sentence.content: However the media has spun this into hysterical heights.
auth_sentence.res_content: However the media has spun this into hysterical heights.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However the media has spun this into hysterical heights.

auth_sentence.content: Everybody seems to be getting hysterical about the appreciation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everybody seems to be getting hysterical about the appreciation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everybody seems to be getting hysterical about the appreciation.

means.word_mean: 情绪异常激动的, 歇斯底里般的

sentences.en: His hysterical laughter made everybody stunned.
sentences.cn: 他那歇斯底里的笑声使所有的人不知所措。

sentences.en: He is hysterical at the sight of the photo.
sentences.cn: 他一看到那张照片就异常激动。
